ENGLISH: Ever since the end of the Great German War, the ideals of freedom and nationhood cherished by the German rebels seem buried. In England, Holland or Brandenburg, the authority of foreign kings is uncontested. But the calm over Europe since the end of the war is an illusion: throughout the continent, the beginnings of industrialisation, the spread of new knowledge and a growing discontent amongst the population hints at changes to come. In Arcadia and Ameriga, young powers are emerging to challenge those in the old world, and in supposedly sleeping Asia, old nations are reinventing themselves...
FRENCH: Depuis la fin de la Grande Guerre Allemande, les idéaux de liberté et d'indépendance des révolutionnaires allemands semblent enterrés. En Angleterre, en Hollande ou dans le Brandebourg, l'autorité de rois étrangers est incontestée. Mais le calme qui règne sur l'Europe depuis la fin de la guerre est trompeur: à travers le continent, les débuts de l'industrialisation, la dissémination de nouveaux savoirs et une insatisfaction croissante parmi les populations augurent des changements à venir. En Amérique, de jeunes puissances émergent pour défier celles du vieux monde, et dans l'Asie réputée endormie, de veilles nations se réinventent...
GERMAN: Ever since the end of the Great German War, the ideals of freedom and nationhood cherished by the German rebels seem buried. In England, Holland or Brandenburg, the authority of foreign kings is uncontested. But the calm over Europe since the end of the war is an illusion: throughout the continent, the beginnings of industrialisation, the spread of new knowledge and a growing discontent amongst the population hints at changes to come. In America, young powers are emerging to challenge those in the old world, and in supposedly sleeping Asia, old nations are reinventing themselves...
